summary: This bill, the National Wildlife Refuge System Invasive Species Strike Team Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish a program to combat invasive species within the National Wildlife Refuge System. The program will involve establishing strike teams trained in early detection and rapid response, partnerships with various entities, and the use of standardized reporting platforms. The bill authorizes appropriations of $15 million annually from 2026-2030 and mandates reports on the program's progress.
